text: “Brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā thậngh̄lāy! Thæ̂cring brrdā mu chri knận s̄omm dạngnận phwk k̄heā cng xỳā k̄hêā kıl̂ xạl-mạṣ̄yidil ḥa rxm h̄lạngcāk pī k̄hxng phwk k̄heā nī̂ læa h̄āk phwk cêā klạw khwām yākcn xạllxḥ̒ k̆ ca thrng h̄ı̂ phwk cêā mạ̀ngmī cāk khwām kruṇā k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ h̄āk phraxngkh̒ thrng pras̄ngkh̒ thæ̂ cring xạllxḥ̒ pĕn p̄hū̂thrng rxbrū̂ p̄hū̂thrng prīchā ỵāṇ”
